name: architecture.toml

topic.name: Project Architecture
topic.description: Facts about project structure and patterns

facts.question: What is the project structure?
facts.answer: core/ contains engine (app, builder, dev-server), src/ contains content (spec, prototype). Rules/ in root for LLM instructions.

facts.question: How does the build process work?
facts.answer: Builder reads TOML/MD from src/spec/, converts to JSON, outputs to public/generated/. Vite then builds the React app.

facts.question: What is the dev vs prod difference?
facts.answer: Dev: API server serves files dynamically. Prod: Static JSON files in public/generated/

facts.question: How does state management work?
facts.answer: Zustand for global state. Stores in src/prototype/stores/. Auth store uses persist middleware for localStorage.

facts.question: How are forms handled?
facts.answer: React Hook Form + Zod for validation. Custom useForm hook wraps both. Schemas in src/prototype/schemas/.
